column4: I need a way to access an internal hard drive via USB.  I want an enclosure (because they seem more reliable than hdd-usb adapters in general) but I want something that will work with both 2.5 and 3.5 drives.
Are 2.5 and 3.5 IDE drives the same as far as connection points?
Ditto for SATA 2.5 and 3.5.  Are the connections the same?  In other words, could I mount a 2.5 drive in a 3.5 enclosure?
